name: Bee Gone! (Brain Digger)
description:
A local co-op game where two brothers have to protect their home from an intrusive bee.

The game was developed with Godot with 3D assets made in Maya as a project for the screen based arts (animation) department in Bezalel Academy of Art and Design.

It's designed to be a show floor game where people would come by, play a quick round and hopefully come out feeling something a little different. Unfortunately, due to COVID-19, the game has never been shown at an exhibition.

Players control with WASD and the arrow keys or with two gamepads.

NOTE: Although it's possible, please do not play this game alone. It is meant to be played with two players.

NOTE2: Load times may be very long and the frame may freeze for a minute after the loading bar completes. This game was made under a harsh deadline so there was no time to optimize assets. Once the game loads, it should run smoothly on most computers, including those with very basic GPUs.
